title: Palladium(II) complexes bearing mesoionic carbene ligands: catalytic application in domino Sonogashira coupling/cyclization reactions for one-pot synthesis of benzofuran and indole derivatives
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27141-27152
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03485F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Om Prakash Joshi, Ramalingam Thirumoorthi, Ram T. Pardasani, Sriparna Ray, Chandrakanta Dash
Indole and benzofuran derivatives were synthesized with good diversity in moderate to good yields via a domino Sonogashira coupling/cyclization process using 1,2,3-triazolylidene-based palladium PEPPSI complexes.
